ing: 1 fluid ounce sweet and sour mix
des: "After scouring the Internet in search of an extra-special cocktail for our Willy Wonka-themed backyard movie party, it became apparent that I would have to step into my cocktail laboratory and invent my own.  After many back-breaking hours spent calibrating specimens which were analyzed by my friends, I came up with this recipe that I'm confident even Willy Wonka himself would be proud to call The Fizzy Lifting Drink.  Warning:  This drink may cause mischievous behavior."
ins: Pour the bubble gum vodka, sweet and sour mix, vanilla vodka, strawberry vodka, and maraschino cherry juice into a cocktail shaker over ice. Cover, and shake until the outside of the shaker has frosted. Strain into two chilled glass, and top with champagne to serve.
